Package arcade.patch.env.location

Class PatchLocationRect

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.env.location.PatchLocation
      • arcade.patch.env.location.PatchLocationRect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Location
    public final class PatchLocationRect
extends PatchLocation
    Concrete implementation of PatchLocation for rectangular Grid to a rectangular Lattice.

    Grid coordinates are in terms of (x, y) and the Lattice coordinates are in (a, b). Rectangular Lattice subcoordinates are ordered 0 - 3, with 0 at the top left and going clockwise around. 

         ---------
     | 0 | 1 |
     ---------
     | 2 | 3 |
     ---------
    For simulations with DEPTH > 0 (3D simulations), each the rectangular grid is offset in relative to the rectangular lattice. Therefore, each cell in a location has four neighboring locations in the same layer, four neighboring locations in the layer above, and four neighboring locations in the layer below. Simulations with DEPTH > 1 must have a MARGIN > 0, otherwise the offset location coordinates will be associated with lattice coordinates that are out of bounds of the array.

      • updateConfigs

        public static void updateConfigs​(PatchSeries series)
        Updates static configuration variables.

        Environment sizes are not set until the simulation series is created. Calculations for coordinates depend on these sizes, so the Location needs to be updated based on the series configuration.

        Parameters:
        series - the current simulation series

      • calculateChecks

        void calculateChecks()
        Updates the possible moves that can be made.

        Each direction of movement (+x, -x, +y, -y, +z, -z) is tracked by each bit within a byte.

        Specified by:
        calculateChecks in class PatchLocation

      • getPerimeter

        public double getPerimeter​(double f)
        Calculates the perimeter of a cell occupying the location.

        Estimates the perimeter of cell occupying the rectangular location. Volume fraction used to take fraction of the perimeter of the rectangle. If fraction is not 1 (i.e. at least two cells in the location), then an additional inner segment is added.

        Specified by:
        getPerimeter in class PatchLocation
        Parameters:
        f - the fraction of total volume
        Returns:
        the perimeter of the cell

      • getNeighbors

        public java.util.ArrayList<Location> getNeighbors()
        Gets the location of the neighbors to the current location.

        We check if a neighbor location is valid by comparing the movement checks byte with the neighbor location byte.

        Specified by:
        getNeighbors in class PatchLocation
        Returns:
        the list of neighbor locations
